[00:04.41]Turn that bottle up and drink it
[00:06.56]Crank that jukebox up and Hank it
[00:08.54]Bartender pour another round
[00:12.44]Here's to our best bad decisions
[00:14.59]Situation no conditions
[00:16.58]Oh and memories we all need to drown
[00:20.32]So fill your cup
[00:21.55]Raise it up
[00:22.76]Jump in and join the club
[00:24.49]And float this whiskey river reservoir
[00:28.22]We're gonna spend the weekend
[00:30.86]In the deep end of a dive bar
[00:36.43]'Cause up in here you're not
[00:38.06]The only loved and left her
[00:39.67]Lost and lonely one who's ever swam against the tide
[00:44.63]Thinkin' this is your oasis
[00:46.60]It's the safest of the places
[00:48.63]That a broken heart can find to hide
[00:52.40]So here's a toast coast to coast
[00:54.69]With a big old adios to wishes wasted on them falling stars
[01:00.25]We're gonna spend the weekend
[01:02.79]In the deep end of a dive bar
[01:08.36]Yeah it's just chapter after chapter of happy never after
[01:12.54]But that's just the way the story goes
[01:16.25]For some bar stool believers
[01:18.59]Wear our heart out on our sleevers
[01:20.45]Just going where the neon glows
[01:40.08]Yeah it's just chapter after chapter of happy never after
[01:44.34]But that's just the way the story goes
[01:48.05]Yeah we're just never quite belongers
[01:50.36]Hanger on-ers way too longers
[01:52.40]Just buzzing where the neon glows
[01:57.16]Problems we all got 'em
[01:58.40]Let 'em sink down to the bottom
[02:00.42]Doesn't matter who or where you are
[02:03.85]We're gonna spend the weekend in the deep end
[02:08.40]The water's fine ya'll so just come on in
[02:12.37]To the deep end of a dive bar
[02:20.08]Of this dive bar
[02:23.74]Talking 'bout a dive bar

[00:20.32]所以把酒杯倒满

[00:28.22]我们要共度周末
[00:30.86]在廉价酒吧的最底端
[00:36.43]因为在这里你并没有

[00:44.63]以为这是你的绿洲
[00:46.60]这是最安全的地方
